name: custom-slack-devops
description: Custom Slack webhook for DevOps and incident management

commands.name: incident
commands.prompt_template:
Start incident response:

Incident Report: {{event.text}}
Reported By: <@{{event.user}}>
Channel: {{event.channel}}
Timestamp: {{event.ts}}

Initiate:
1. Assess severity and impact
2. Identify affected systems
3. Create incident timeline
4. Suggest immediate mitigation steps
5. Identify required stakeholders
6. Set up incident channel if needed

commands.name: deploy
commands.prompt_template:
Execute deployment:

Request: {{event.text}}
Requested By: <@{{event.user}}>
Channel: {{event.channel}}

Deployment Checklist:
1. Verify tests pass
2. Check staging environment
3. Review change log
4. Backup current state
5. Execute deployment
6. Verify health checks
7. Monitor error rates
8. Report status to channel

commands.name: rollback
commands.prompt_template:
Execute rollback:

Reason: {{event.text}}
Requested By: <@{{event.user}}>
Channel: {{event.channel}}

Rollback Procedure:
1. Identify current version
2. Identify rollback target version
3. Assess rollback risks
4. Execute rollback
5. Verify services healthy
6. Document incident
7. Report completion

commands.name: status
commands.prompt_template:
Report system status:

Request: {{event.text}}
Channel: {{event.channel}}

Provide:
- Service health status
- Recent deployments
- Active incidents
- Error rates
- Performance metrics
- Upcoming maintenance

commands.name: logs
commands.prompt_template:
Analyze logs:

Request: {{event.text}}
Requested By: <@{{event.user}}>
Channel: {{event.channel}}

Fetch and analyze:
- Recent error logs
- Warning patterns
- Performance anomalies
- Security events
- Key insights and trends

commands.name: scale
commands.prompt_template:
Manage scaling:

Request: {{event.text}}
Requested By: <@{{event.user}}>

Scaling Actions:
1. Assess current capacity
2. Analyze load patterns
3. Calculate required capacity
4. Execute scaling operation
5. Verify service health
6. Update monitoring dashboards

commands.name: metrics
commands.prompt_template:
Generate metrics report:

Request: {{event.text}}
Channel: {{event.channel}}

Metrics to include:
- Request rates
- Error rates
- Response times
- Resource utilization
- Cost analysis
- Trends and anomalies

commands.name: oncall
commands.prompt_template:
Manage on-call:

Request: {{event.text}}
From: <@{{event.user}}>
Channel: {{event.channel}}

Actions:
- Check on-call schedule
- Assess escalation need
- Notify appropriate personnel
- Create incident ticket if needed
- Document escalation path
